Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until Oct 5, Mon to Fri, 11 AM to 3 PM
[4] Service runs every 16 minutes between Burnside Av and Woodlawn in the Bronx
Some uptown [4] trains skip 170 St, Mt Eden Av and 176 St


The last stop for alternate trains from Manhattan is Burnside Av.
• Transfer at Burnside Av to continue your trip.

Uptown trains ending at Burnside Av skip 170 St, Mt Eden Av and 176 St.
• Transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4] train at 167 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations.




Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until Oct 5, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3 PM
Woodlawn-bound [4] trains skip 183 St, Fordham Rd, Kingsbridge Rd and Bedford Pk Blvd in the Bronx


For service to these stations, take the [4] to Mosholu Pkwy and transfer to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

For service from these stations, take the [4] to Burnside Av and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4].

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations.

Until Oct 5, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Jamaica Center-bound [J] and Middle Village-bound [M] trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av in Brooklyn


For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [J] or [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Middle Village-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Marcy Av or Myrtle Av.

Sep 17 - 21, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM

Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE
Sep 17 - 21, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Coney Island-bound [Q] trains run express from Prospect Park to Sheepshead Bay in Brooklyn


Trains stop at Church Av, Newkirk Plaza and Kings Hwy.

For service to Parkside Av, Beverley, Cortelyou Rds, Avenue H, Avenue J, Avenue M, Avenue U and Neck Rd, take the [Q] to Church Av, Newkirk Plaza, Kings Hwy or Sheepshead Bay and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [B]* or [Q].

For service from these stations, take the [B] or [Q] to Kings Hwy, Newkirk Plaza, Church Av or Prospect Park and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [Q].

line.name: Montauk
line.text:
Planned Work

Buses Replace Midday Trains Between Patchogue & Montauk on Weekdays

To accommodate state-of-good-repair track work and grade crossing improvements, buses will replace midday, off-peak trains between Patchogue and Montauk through Friday, November 9. The trackwork will take place from 8:36AM until 5:00PM each weekday. Service will be affected as follows:

Westbound
  • The weekday trains that usually depart Montauk at 11:18AM and 2:48PM, and the trains that usually depart Speonk at 2:00PM and 3:05PM will originate in Patchogue.Customers at stations Montauk through Bellport will board buses to Patchogue, then connect with trains for service to points west.
  • Customers will board buses up to 1 hour and 4 minutes later than normal train time.
Eastbound
  • The 8:48AM and 11:27AM trains from Babylon and the 11:25AM and 12:43PM trains from Jamaica will terminate in Patchogue. Customers will transfer to buses for transportation to stations Bellport through Montauk.
  • Customers at Penn Station planning to connect with the 8:48 AM train from Babylon to Patchogue, must take the 7:31AM train from Penn Station to Babylon (not the 7:49AM from Penn).
  • Please plan for up to 41 minutes of additional travel time.
For specific departure times,pick up a copy of the Montauk Branch timetable dated Sept. 4 to Nov. 11 or see http://web.mta.info/lirr/Timetable/Branch2/MontaukBranch.pdf
